name: Pong Evolution (Fozkyz)
description:
What if Pong had guns and powerups that could change the course of the game ?

Be careful, you should expect some mayhem to happen !

  • Use the arrow keys to move your paddle around and shoot with the 'A' key.

/!\ WIP /!\ This game is still in development, so feel free to give me some feedback ! /!\ WIP /!\
